name: Entity Researchers: Prologue
description:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2003060/Monsters_Domain_Prologue/

We are the Entity Investigation & Research Institute.

You just got hired by EIRI; researching and battling the Visitors, unknown entities that have invaded our world. A dark sci-fi dungeon crawling RPG with themes of exploration and survival.


Play to Level 10 in the Entity Researchers: Prologue; continue with the full game.


Explore: Investigate procedurally generated maps for entities and items. Improve your loadout with over 180 standard items and countless randomized Uniques.



Research: Discover more about the entities to unlock over 20 different moves with unique Critical bonuses. With over 150 standard entities, extra randomized bosses and elite modifiers the threat is imminent.



Battle: Destroy entities to gain XP, currency and items, unlock and defeat bosses to receive high rarity rewards. With hybrid real-time/turn-based combat every second counts.

Features:

  • Hybrid real-time/turn-based battles.
  • Random maps.
  • 90 basic entities and 60 bosses.
  • 10 secret entities.
  • Random Unique items and 180+ standard items.
  • 20+ moves with unique Critical bonuses.
  • Random Bounty bosses.
  • Hardcore mode.
